9120.title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

tosdr.case: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time
tosdr.tldr: The info states "There has been a very brief period where uploads were logged, this was due to certain visitors uploading highly fucking illegal content to the service. However normally we don't log any requests."

9121.title: The terms for this service are easy to read

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read
tosdr.tldr: There short and easy to read although they do not follow their own terms, saying no logs but then log some users
